description.narrative: - Sustainability and Standards: By investing in Sinofarm, IFC will be supporting a Company with a keen desire to contribute to the sustainable rural development and adopt higher food safety/quality standards. - Support rural livelihood: The Project will source corn for feed from a large number of local farmers, providing a stable source of income for rural farmers. - Employment: The Project will created jobs by promoting standardized and large-scale dairy farming with modern technology. IFC''s investment has strong impact on livelihoods in the rural economies of the frontier region.

As one of the early mover dairy farming companies in China, Beijing Sinofarm Stud Livestock Company Limited (Sinofarm or the Company) plans to build a 20,000 cow dairy farm in Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region of China to meet the fast growing domestic demand for high quality dairy products and improve food safety.
